title: A Vous la France! Eps. 9-15
brief_description: The second part of an introduction to simple everyday French designed for anyone who wants to use French on holiday, on business or amongst friends. The course is based on recordings of French people going about their daily lives in shops, at work and at home. The first part of each program introduces basic language to be learnt and the second part is a mini-documentary on aspects of French life as filmed in and around Grenoble and Pezenas in the Languedoc. Workbooks and audio-cassettes are available to reinforce the video programs. Presenters are Carolle Rousseau and Patrick Simpson-Jones.
